text: Andiast was a municipality of the district of Surselva in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2018, the former municipalities of Andiast and Waltensburg/Vuorz merged into the municipality of Breil/Brigels. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Andiast * Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden
title: Andiast
